    • getPaymentsByEvent

      @GetMapping("/payment/stablishment/{stablishmentID}/event/{eventName}/{eventDate}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> getPaymentsByEvent(@PathVariable("stablishmentID") Long stablishmentID, @PathVariable("eventName") String eventName, @PathVariable("eventDate") LocalDate eventDate)
      This method is used to get a list of payment by event.
      Parameters:
      stablishmentID - This is the ID of the stablishment.
      eventName - This is the name of the event.
      eventDate - This is the date of the event.
      Returns:
      a list of payment.
      Throws:
      Exception - if there is an error in the server.

      @GetMapping("/payment/{paymentID}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> getPaymentByID(@PathVariable("paymentID") Long paymentID)

      Returns:

      Exception - if there is an error in the server.

    • generatePaymentForUser

      @PostMapping("/payment/generate/user/{userID}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> generatePaymentForUser(@PathVariable("userID") String userID)
      This method is used to generate all the payment for a user.
      Parameters:
      userID - This is the ID of the user.
      Returns:
      a message that indicates the payment has been generated successfully.
      Throws:
      Exception - if there is an error in the server.

      @PostMapping("/payment/generate/stablishment/{stablishmentID}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> generatePaymentForStablishment(@PathVariable("stablishmentID") Long stablishmentID, @RequestHeader("Authorization") String token)
      This method is used to generate all the payment for a stablishment.

    • payPayment

      @PutMapping("/payment/pay/{paymentID}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> payPayment(@PathVariable("paymentID") Long paymentID)
      This method is used to pay a payment.
      Parameters:
      paymentID - This is the ID of the payment.
      Returns:
      a message that indicates the payment has been paid successfully.
      Throws:
      Exception - if there is an error in the server.
